Privacy Policy

5. How We Process and Retain Personal Information
Privacy Policy

We collect personal data or personal information through the Site (https://www.talentlms.com/) and the Services ("Talent LMS").
We collect and process personal data in a transparent manner, to the extent necessary for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes, and do not process it further in a manner incompatible with those purposes.
